com.splunk
Class Service

java.lang.Object
  com.splunk.HttpService
      com.splunk.Service

public class Service
extends HttpService

Representation of a Splunk service at a given address (host:port) accessed using a given protocol "scheme" (http or https). A service instance also captures an optional namespace context consisting of an optional owner name (or "-" wildcard) and optional app name (or "-" wildcard. In order to access Service members the instance must be authenticated by presenting credentials using the login method or by constructing the instance using the connect method which both creates and authenticates the instance.

connect

public static Service connect(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> args)
Establish a connection to a Splunk service using the given arguments. This member constructs a new Service instance and authenticates the session using credentials passed in the args map.

Parameters:
args - Map of arguments used to initialize and authenticate the sevice.
Returns:
A new Service instance.

getDistributedPeers

public EntityCollection<DistributedPeer> getDistributedPeers()
Returns collection of distributed search peers. A search peer is a Splunk server to which another Splunk server distributes searches. The Splunk server where the search originates is referred to as the search head.

Returns:
Collection of search peers.

send

public ResponseMessage send(java.lang.String path,
                            RequestMessage request)
Issue an HTTP request against the service using the given path and request message. This method overrides the base HttpService send method and applies the Splunk auth header which is required for authenticated interactions with the Splunk service.

Overrides:
send in class HttpService
Parameters:
path - Request path.
request - Request message.
Returns:
HTTP response.

setToken

public void setToken(java.lang.String value)
Provides a session token for use by this service instance. This allows sharing of session tokens across multiple service instances.

Parameters:
value - Session token.
